Home / Accessories / Bags / QuadGuard BP X3

QuadGuard BP X3

160.00 €

Racing drone backpack with internal space for 1 FPV quadcopter, 15″ laptop, transmitter and batteries, plus mounts for more quads on the exterior.

Category: Bags
  • Share on Twitter
  • Share on Facebook
  • Pin this product
  • Share via Email
  • Description
  • Additional information
  • Reviews (0)

Description

The top choice among quad racers, this ultra-protective backpack was created by racing fanatics with room for everything you need to fly across the finish line. Includes space for up to 4 FPV quads and 15” laptop. Back loading access provides a stable, on-site work station!

  • Multi-level, adjustable divider system securely houses quad, transmitter, batteries, chargers, propellers, small to mid-size FPV goggles, LCD screen, 15” laptop and other essentials
  • Interior storage for 1 quad with up to 5” props attached
  • Exterior mounting locations and straps for up to 3 additional quads, ground station tripods or collapsible chair
  • Removable toolbox offers easy access to tools for quick repairs
  • CradleFit™ pocket suspends and protects up to 15” laptop
  • Targeted lightweight protection. Compression-molded FormShell™ technology protects gear from impact without added weight or bulk
  • Moisture wicking back panel and adjustable shoulder and chest straps keep you cool and comfortable
  • FormShell™ molded front pocket offers easy access to sunglasses, headphones and other essentials
  • Stretch and zipper side pockets provide quick access to water bottles and other small items
  • Interior quad storage platform lined with rugged 600D exterior material to fight abrasion
  • Patented, built-in All Weather AW Cover™ protects gear from rain, dust and sand

Additional information

Manufacturers

Lowepro
